subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Tennessee Titans cornerback Pacman Jones is hoping to persuade the N.F.L. Commissioner to reduce the season-long suspension he received for off-field conduct.
snippet: Tennessee Titans cornerback Pacman Jones is hoping to persuade the N.F.L. Commissioner to reduce the season-long suspension he received for off-field conduct.
